channel.title: Npc Death Experience
channel.description:
Hey..
I was just wondering how to make an npc give you experience in a certain stat, say.. slayer, when it dies.
Like, you attack a crawling hand, you kill it, and as it dies (like for example when the item appears and the npc disapears) you gain 20 slayer experience.....
^ That was an example.
But yeah. I just need to know how!! How to make npcs give you exp in a certain stat when they die.
Please Help.a.s.a.p.
Jube.

item.title: Npc Death Experience
item.dc:creator: @cocoa cocoa
item.description:
@cocoa wrote:

[quote="`Rich, post:16, topic:232570"][code] if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == 1832) {
int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling;
client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player];

	ppl.addSkillXP(15, 12);
	ItemHandler.addItem(Item2.randomcavebug(), npcs[NPCID].absX, npcs[NPCID].absY, 1, GetNpcKiller(NPCID), false);
}[/code][/quote]

oops lol forgot those two lines. Thanks rich.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Death Experience
item.dc:creator: @tonypker13 tonypker13
item.description:
@tonypker13 wrote:

Oh you mean when it dies!!
This is exactly what I was trying to do lol.
Started trying about 3 hours ago but havent figured it out yet. Ill keep trying :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: September 21, 2008, 08:32:49 pm[/size][hr]WEWT! I think I figured it out!!

if(npcs[NPCID].npcType == NPC ID) { int Player = npcs[NPCID].StartKilling; client ppl = (client) server.playerHandler.players[Player]; try{ ppl.addSkillXP(amount of exp, 18); } catch(Exception E) { ppl.addSkillXP(amount of exp, 18); } }

Read full topic

item.title: Npc Death Experience
item.dc:creator: @Sinior_Jube_Head Sinior Jube Head
item.description:
@Sinior_Jube_Head wrote:

Tony, that guide is what i originally used…

But the thing is, that just gives you the exp whenever you click the npc…

I need to know how to make an npc give you exp when it dies, or people will just mass click and be lvl 99 in w/e, ie slayer, in no time…

So ah… yeh.please help.

Jube.

Read full topic
